Title: The Hierophant
Plot: Leonardo builds an underwater suit and uses the sewers to enter the Vatican, where he meets the Pope and the mysterious prisoner. Giuliano reveals the true identity of Rome's spy.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Ben Loyd-Holmes, Ian Pirie, Ian Conningham, Fiona Dolman, Jason Langley, Stephen Marzella, Ross O'Hennessey, David Sturzaker, Paul Westwood, Tony Wredden
